name: Sayre Land Company v. Pennsylvania Public Utility, Commission, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Sayre Land Co. v. Pennsylvania Public Utility

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
parties: Sayre Land Company v. Pennsylvania Public Utility, Commission, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order of the Superior Court reversing decree of the lower court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Ervin, 196 Pa. Superior Ct. 417, 175 A. 2d 307 (1961).
Mr. Justice Cohen and Mr. Justice Eagen would reverse the order of the Superior Court and reinstate the final decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Dauphin County.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Edward Munce, Assistant Counsel, with him Joseph I. Lewis, Chief Counsel, for Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission, appellant.
James H. Looser, with him Harry H. Frank, and McEees, Wallace é Eurick, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Sayre Land Company v. Pennsylvania Public Utility, Commission, Appellant.
Argued May 22, 1962.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
November 13, 1962:
Edward Munce, Assistant Counsel, with him Joseph I. Lewis, Chief Counsel, for Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission, appellant.
James H. Looser, with him Harry H. Frank, and McEees, Wallace é Eurick, for appellee.
